import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get WhatsApp templates"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1/accounts/{accountId}/channels/{channelId}/templates"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint is used to get your registered WhatsApp message template and their approval status. 

WhatsApp Message Templates are message formats for common reusable messages a business may want to send. 
Businesses must use Message Templates for sending notifications to customers.
Any message sent outside the 24h customer service window, needs to be a template message, to be delivered. 
Advertising, marketing, or promotional messages are not permitted.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"accountId","in":"path","description":"You must replace *{accountId}* with the accountid that you want to use.","required":true,"schema":{"maxLength":36,"minLength":32,"pattern":"^[0-9A-Fa-f]{8}[-]?(?:[0-9A-Fa-f]{4}[-]?){3}[0-9A-Fa-f]{12}$","type":"string"}},{"in":"path","name":"channelId","required":true,"description":"Channel identifier","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
